body: Changelings are defined by their class levels—they don't have racial Hit Dice. All changelings have the following racial traits.
name: Changeling

sections.body: Changelings are frail, but are clever and comely.
sections.name: –2 Constitution, +2 Wisdom, +2 Charisma

sections.body:
A changeling possesses one of the following traits, depending on the type of hag her mother is.

Hulking Changeling (Annis Hag)The changeling gains a +1 racial bonus on melee damage rolls.

Green Widow (Green Hag)The changeling gains a +2 racial bonus on Bluff checks against creatures that are sexually attracted to her.

Sea Lungs (Sea Hag)The changeling can hold her breath for a number of rounds equal to 3 × her Constitution score before she risks drowning.
sections.name: Hag Trait

sections.body: A changeling's hands and fingernails tend to harden and become sharp, granting her two claw attacks, each of which deals 1d4 points of damage.
sections.name: Claws

sections.body: Changelings can see in the dark up to 60 feet.
sections.name: Darkvision

sections.body: Changelings begin play speaking Common and the primary language of their host society. Changelings who have high Intelligence scores can choose from the following: Aklo, Draconic, Dwarven, Elven, Giant, Gnoll, Goblin, and Orc.
sections.name: Languages
